name: GetCompensationScorecardInfo
description:
Fetches compensation scorecard information from Workday.

Call this tool to retrieve detailed information about compensation scorecards, including name, description, status, default goals, and related profiles as of a specific effective date. Useful for exploring advanced compensation data.

parameters.name: effective_date_for_scorecard
parameters.description: Effective date the scorecard task takes effect, formatted as a string (e.g., 'YYYY-MM-DD').

value_schema.description: Effective date the scorecard task takes effect.

parameters.name: maximum_results_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response, up to 100. Default is 20 if not specified.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

parameters.name: response_start_index
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the first object in the response collection. Default is 0. Use with 'limit' to manage paging. E.g., if 'limit' is 5 and 'offset' is 9, the response starts with the 10th object.

value_schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.
